purpose: The ECSA Steering Committee invites the submission of Letters of Interest to organize the European conference on Software Architecture (ECSA) in September 2027 and onwards.
evidence_sentences: The ECSA Steering Committee now invites the submission of Letters of Interest to organize ECSA in September 2027 and onwards.
The Letters of Interest are meant to inform the ECSA Steering Committee of the potential intent of teams to organize ECSA in prospective venues.
Submission of the Letter of Interest: Deadline: 30th June 2025 (23:59 Anywhere on Earth)
